name: Cupids Love Crisis
description:
Cupids having a rough day sorting through all of the positive feelings in the world. Help Cupid collect love hearts and power up his love arrows in this light hearted clicker style game. Tainted hearts will corrupt his arrows so protect him while he sorts out the positive love hearts. You'll have to be quick as the levels get increasingly difficult as the evil hearts begin to overwhelm Cupid. With endless levels and increasing difficulty Cupid will need alot of help. Adjust difficulty by increasing the speed or play it casually and spread the love. Enjoy hours of family friendly fun in Cupids Love Crisis.

Features:
Endless levels
Endless increasing difficulty
3 Difficulty settings
Simple but challenging game play
